itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Jarred Taylor are joined by Jason Ross and Jeff Kirkham to discuss their new book "Black Autumn" and the complexities of writing an Post-Apocalyptic thriller. They also chat about ultimate trolls.
